characters: Driver of a white sedan, motorcyclist
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a busy urban road. A white sedan is ahead, and a motorcyclist suddenly appears from the right side, causing potential danger.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is gradually decelerating from 43 km/h to 32 km/h over the 10 seconds. The vehicle maintains a safe distance from the white sedan ahead while reacting to the sudden appearance of the motorcyclist from the right side.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white sedan, approximately 20 meters away, maintaining a steady speed. 2) Right side: A motorcyclist on a red motorcycle, approximately 2 meters away, suddenly appearing and moving into the vehicles path.
